title: China's tech firms in limbo amid COVID resurgence, US scrutiny - TechCrunch
content: China's tech firms in limbo amid COVID resurgence, US scrutiny  TechCrunch
description: 2022 is not looking any easier to many Chinese tech companies. The slew of new cyberspace regulations introduced over the past year or so, from anti-competition rules to restrictions on the use of algorithms, has prompted internet outfits of all sizes to reshape their business models and monetizatiâ€¦
